properties.areaDesc: Lowndes, AL; Montgomery, AL; Elmore, AL; Dallas, AL; Autauga, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 8:10PM CST until February 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warnings continue for the Alabama River At
Montgomery...R.F. Henry Lock and Dam...and Selma...

.Heavy rainfall over the past 2 days continues to produce rises along
the Alabama River. Minor flooding is forecast to continue along the
river for the next few days.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Alabama River At Montgomery.
* until late Saturday night...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* AT 7 PM Tuesday the stage was 38.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 35 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 40.9 feet by
tomorrow evening. The river will fall below flood stage early
Saturday afternoon.
* Impact...At 26 feet...Some flooding of low lying areas and
secondary roads begins in the Montgomery area. Flooding of the golf
course at Maxwell Air Force Base and portions of River Road occurs
at stages around 30 feet and higher.
* Impact...At 35 feet...Extensive flooding of low lands in the area
occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
